languages.text: "Вести и направлять. Паству, что жаждет познать Неумирающего, но страшится смерти. Учеников, что ищут ответы в смерти, а сами не умеют жить. Защищать тех, кто никогда не знал о существовании Кровавой паутины. Кто знал, и был благодарен. И даже тех, кто всегда ненавидел нас. Видеть грядущее. Слышать прошлое. Принимать настоящее. И плести паутину из веры и крови настолько прочную, что ни один враг не в силах будет рассечь. Таково бремя Висиря, таков завет Матери-паучихи".

"It is the Vizsier's duty to watch over the flock. To lead those who want to learn more of the Undying One but are fearful of death, and guide those who seek answers in death but do not know how to live. The Vizsier protects all — those who do not know we exist, those who are grateful for our service, and even those who hate us. The Vizsier sees what is to come, remembers the past, and accepts the present. They spin a web of faith and blood so strong that no enemy may sunder it. This is the Vizsier's burden. This is the legacy of the Matriarch Spider."

languages.text: «El Visir tiene el deber de velar por su rebaño. Tutelar a quienes desean saber más sobre el Inmortal, pero temen la muerte, y guiar a quienes buscan respuestas en la muerte pero ignoran cómo vivir. El Visir protege a todos: a quienes no saben que existimos, a quienes nos agradecen nuestro servicio, incluso a quienes nos odian. El Visir conoce el porvenir, recuerda el pasado y acepta el presente. Teje una red de sangre y devoción tan fuerte que ningún enemigo es capaz de romperla. Esa es la carga que soporta el Visir. Este es el legado de la Araña Matriarca».
languages.original_text: "It is the Vizsier's duty to watch over the flock. To lead those who want to learn more of the Undying One but are fearful of death, and guide those who seek answers in death but do not know how to live. The Vizsier protects all — those who do not know we exist, those who are grateful for our service, and even those who hate us. The Vizsier sees what is to come, remembers the past, and accepts the present. They spin a web of faith and blood so strong that no enemy may sunder it. This is the Vizsier's burden. This is the legacy of the Matriarch Spider."

Este es el legado de la Araña Matriarca».

languages.text: 「群れを見守ることがヴィジールの務め。不死の者について深く知りた糸望みつつ死を恐れている者たちを導き、死に答えを求めつつ生き方を知らぬ者を導く。ヴィジールはすべての者を守るの。我らの存在を知らぬ者を、我らの奉仕に感謝する者を、そして我らを憎むものまでも。ヴィジールはこれから起こることを予見し、過去を思い起こし、現在を受け入れる。いかなる敵も打ち砕くことができないほどに強固な信念と血の網を紡ぐ。それこそがヴィジールの責務。これが蜘蛛の師母の遺産よ」
languages.original_text: "It is the Vizsier's duty to watch over the flock. To lead those who want to learn more of the Undying One but are fearful of death, and guide those who seek answers in death but do not know how to live. The Vizsier protects all — those who do not know we exist, those who are grateful for our service, and even those who hate us. The Vizsier sees what is to come, remembers the past, and accepts the present. They spin a web of faith and blood so strong that no enemy may sunder it. This is the Vizsier's burden. This is the legacy of the Matriarch Spider."

traits.locale_text: 「群れを見守ることがヴィジールの務め。不死の者について深く知りた糸望みつつ死を恐れている者たちを導き、死に答えを求めつつ生き方を知らぬ者を導く。ヴィジールはすべての者を守るの。我らの存在を知らぬ者を、我らの奉仕に感謝する者を、そして我らを憎むものまでも。ヴィジールはこれから起こることを予見し、過去を思い起こし、現在を受け入れる。いかなる敵も打ち砕くことができないほどに強固な信念と血の網を紡ぐ。それこそがヴィジールの責務。これが蜘蛛の師母の遺産よ」

languages.text: “宿老的职责是照看牧群，引导那些渴望了解不死之神但却惧怕死亡的人，引导那些在死亡中寻求答案但却不知道如何活着的人。宿老负责保护所有人，包括那些感激我们的人，那些不知道我们存在的人，甚至包括那些憎恨我们的人。宿老铭记过去，接纳现在，预见未来。宿老要用信仰与鲜血编织无比坚韧的罗网，任何敌人都无法将其撕裂。这就是宿老的职责，这就是蛛母族长的遗产。”
languages.original_text: "It is the Vizsier's duty to watch over the flock. To lead those who want to learn more of the Undying One but are fearful of death, and guide those who seek answers in death but do not know how to live. The Vizsier protects all — those who do not know we exist, those who are grateful for our service, and even those who hate us. The Vizsier sees what is to come, remembers the past, and accepts the present. They spin a web of faith and blood so strong that no enemy may sunder it. This is the Vizsier's burden. This is the legacy of the Matriarch Spider."

traits.locale_text: “宿老的职责是照看牧群，引导那些渴望了解不死之神但却惧怕死亡的人，引导那些在死亡中寻求答案但却不知道如何活着的人。宿老负责保护所有人，包括那些感激我们的人，那些不知道我们存在的人，甚至包括那些憎恨我们的人。宿老铭记过去，接纳现在，预见未来。宿老要用信仰与鲜血编织无比坚韧的罗网，任何敌人都无法将其撕裂。这就是宿老的职责，这就是蛛母族长的遗产。”

languages.text: "Es ist die Pflicht des Wesirs, über die Herde zu wachen. Er muss jene führen, die mehr über den Todlosen erfahren möchten, aber den Tod fürchten, und jene anleiten, die Antworten im Tod suchen, aber nicht wissen, wie man lebt. Der Wesir beschützt alle ... jene, die nicht wissen, dass wir existieren, jene, die dankbar für unsere Dienste sind und selbst jene, die uns hassen. Der Wesir sieht, was kommen wird, erinnert sich an die Vergangenheit und akzeptiert die Gegenwart. Er spinnt ein Netz des Glaubens und Blutes, das so stark ist, dass es kein Feind zerstören kann. Das ist die Bürde des Wesirs. Das Vermächtnis der Mutterspinne."
languages.original_text: "It is the Vizsier's duty to watch over the flock. To lead those who want to learn more of the Undying One but are fearful of death, and guide those who seek answers in death but do not know how to live. This is the legacy of the Matriarch Spider."

Das ist die Bürde des Wesirs. Das Vermächtnis der Mutterspinne."

languages.text: « Son devoir consiste à veiller sur ses ouailles. À prendre sous son aile ceux qui veulent en apprendre davantage sur l'Immortel, mais qui ont peur de la mort et à guider ceux qui cherchent des réponses dans la mort, mais n'ont jamais appris à vivre. Le vizir protège tout le monde sans distinction : ceux qui ignorent notre existence, ceux qui rendent grâce à nos services et même ceux qui nous détestent. Il voit l'avenir, il se souvient du passé et il accepte le présent tel qu'il est. Il tisse dans la foi et dans le sang une toile si solide qu'aucun ennemi ne peut la déchirer. Telle est la tâche ô combien difficile de notre berger. Tel est l'héritage de l'araignée matriarche. »
languages.original_text: "It is the Vizsier's duty to watch over the flock. To lead those who want to learn more of the Undying One but are fearful of death, and guide those who seek answers in death but do not know how to live. The Vizsier protects all — those who do not know we exist, those who are grateful for our service, and even those who hate us. The Vizsier sees what is to come, remembers the past, and accepts the present. They spin a web of faith and blood so strong that no enemy may sunder it. This is the Vizsier's burden. This is the legacy of the Matriarch Spider."

languages.text: "Sürüye göz kulak olmak, Vezir'in görevidir. Ölmeyen'i yakından tanımak ama ölümden korkanlara yol göstermek, cevabı ölümde arayan ama nasıl yaşanacağını bilmeyenlerin kılavuzu olmak da ona düşer. Vezir herkesi kollar... Varlığımızdan bihaber olanları, hizmetimizden minnet duyanları, hatta bizden nefret edenleri bile. Vezir; neler olup biteceğini görür, geçmişi hatırlar ve şimdiyi kabul eder. İmanla ve kanla öylesine güçlü bir ağ örer ki hiçbir düşmanın koparamaz. Vezir'in sırtındaki yük de budur. Örümcek Kraliçe'nin mirası budur."
languages.original_text: "It is the Vizsier's duty to watch over the flock. To lead those who want to learn more of the Undying One but are fearful of death, and guide those who seek answers in death but do not know how to live. The Vizsier protects all — those who do not know we exist, those who are grateful for our service, and even those who hate us. The Vizsier sees what is to come, remembers the past, and accepts the present. They spin a web of faith and blood so strong that no enemy may sunder it. This is the Vizsier's burden. This is the legacy of the Matriarch Spider."
